title: Jacket
description: long like a coat; indigo dyed; overlapping front panel fastens on PR; all exposed outer edges faced in pink; neckband and yoke overall appliqued flora and fauna in blue, red, yellow, green, white; pink sleeves appliqued in black and white; indigo cuffs; three beads forming diamonds under arm
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
